morning: How are you feeling this morning, and explain what might be causing it.
Did you wake up feeling calm, and explain why or why not.
Did anything make you feel good already today, and explain.
Did you wake up feeling tight or loose in your body, and explain.
Did you wake up with any strong thoughts, and explain what they felt like.
Did you wake up excited for anything, and explain why.
Did anything bother you this morning, and explain what caused it.
Did you feel focused when you woke up, and explain.
Did you feel rested today, and explain why or why not.
Did you wake up with a question on your mind, and explain.
How does your morning feel right now? Describe it in a short sentence.
Is anything feeling off in your body today? Describe it if you want.
